traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. he never insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around him. he also never judges people by their appearance. his agreeableness also makes him more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way. At least he doesn't mind being insulted or slighted either.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: Timmy loves fire. he will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, he will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if his mood is low. Somehow this fascination with fire leads to a lot more inspiration.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him. At least he is really good at running and for whatever reason seems to be nearly immune to toxic substances.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description:
Timmy has never learned how to learn. The motivation and talent is there, he just needs time and patience. 

    Each skill point increases global learning factor by 2%
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long he stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: bodymodder

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he stands solid like a rock, and equally unmovable.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly but also eats faster, cooks faster and knows his ingredients, barely ever causing food poisoning.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine. his only way to deal with it is hiding in his room or wandering around in sadness.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation. If that happens he will find something to smash.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his random mood swings can get the better of him.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his random mood swings can easily get the better of him.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: Timmy has had proper training with ranged weapons. he shoots accurately and quickly.
traits.name: expertshooter

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions. If there is an upside to this than that no one minds if his face has a scar or two.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing. If there is an upside to this than that no one minds if his face has a scar or two... or ten.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description: Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: deftlydodger

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: sluggish

traits.description: Timmy is not affected by the effects of aging.
traits.name: rasvacoule

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around fighting. he doesn't have the intelligence to do much else.
traits.name: reptilianbrain

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: deadshot

traits.description: Timmy is uncommonly agile and stealthy, with better reflexes and a more flexible body than most.
traits.name: stealthy

traits.description:
Timmy has a special connection to animals and understands them better than most people. Animals also tend to understand what he wants from them. The time he spends with animals is long, but worth it.

    Taming never causes manhunter
    Easier taming of very wild animals
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description:
Timmy is proficient with various construction materials, particularly stone. he will construct anything out of stone three times as fast as others and smooth out your rocky base in no time.

    Stone construction speed +200%
traits.name: architect

traits.description:
Timmy has a unique approach to science. he always thinks outside the box and finds inspiration for intellectual problems in art.

    Artistic increases research speed
traits.name: creativethinker

traits.description: Timmy seems to have rented all the good fortune on this Rimworld.
traits.name: fortunate

traits.description:
Timmy has a special talent to grow plants and nurture them even in hostile enviroments. he can grow any plant, even if other people would fail due to their lack of skills. he would like some plants in his bedroom.

    Can grow any plant regardless of skill
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy is a gun nut, his life revolves around guns, how they are crafted, maintained and used. Quite a handy skill in these circumstances. Just don't hand him a melee weapon.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally coordinated with his hands.
traits.name: hand-eyecoordination

traits.description: Timmy has a keen eye and can spot even tiny mineral deposits. he will occassionally find small clumps of resources when mining any sort of stone or ore. Chance increased for flatter terrain.
traits.name: keeneye

traits.description:
Timmy has had their fair share of encounters with mechanoids. he has become an expert in mechanoid construction and combat, making him uniquely suited to disassemble and fight them.

    Damage versus mechanoids +50%
traits.name: mechanoidexpert

traits.description:
Timmy wants thing to be exactly right. This does take time, but the results speak for themselves.

    Quality level +1 (50% chance)
traits.name: idealist

traits.description: Timmy knows exactly the right words for every situation. This also means his insults hurt more.
traits.name: silvertongue

traits.description:
Timmy has particularly steady hands, which don't even tremble in dire circumstances or when he himself is injured.

    No self-tend penalty
traits.name: steadyhands

traits.description: Timmy has a very strong back or is part mule or something. he can carry significantly more as a normal person.
traits.name: strongback

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom. At least he isn't as affected by prisoners or colonists dying and he doesn't mind wearing a dead person's clothing.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy has an intense fascination with chemical sources of enjoyment. he will consume much more of them and, if not already addicted to any drug and satisfied, will sometimes go on hard drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs. If there is one upside to this it's all the inspiration one can get from drugs.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. he will consume more of them and, if not already addicted to any drug and satisfied, will sometimes go on social drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs. If there is one upside to this it's all the inspiration one can get from drugs.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals, and avoids alcohol and pleasurable drugs. he is a hard working individual.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: Timmy is the descendant of a designer mate. Though most of his ancestral traits are diluted, he is still extremely beautiful and cheerful.
traits.name: designerheritage

traits.description: Timmy is a Cheetah. Timmy is a great runner with a sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, he is not a very Social being.
traits.name: cheetah

traits.description: Timmy is a Leo. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight and is rather Social, compared to other Feline species.
traits.name: leo

traits.description: Timmy is a Jaguar. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, he is not a very Social being.
traits.name: jaguar

traits.description: Timmy is a Panther. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, he is not a very Social being.
traits.name: panther

traits.description: Timmy is a Tigris. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, he is not a very Social being.
traits.name: tigris

traits.description: Timmy is gives a strange impression to the opponent.
traits.name: mysteriousenergy

traits.description: There was once an infamous assassin, well known for her mastery in swordsmanship and her ghostly moves, a nightmare to all those nobles and bigwigs. By earning the title means that Timmy has perfected the melee skill.
traits.name: redscorpio

traits.description: There was a saying about a sniper who was reluctant to kill so she aim for the knee everytime, and thus she was called The Queen. Timmy can earn this title which means that his shooting skill must has been proven many times.
traits.name: thequeen

traits.description: There was once a warrior who encounter 13 knights all by his own and later become the leader of reble and leading it's army invaded the kingdom, thus , getting the name Dragon. Timmy can win this title, means that his battle skill is remarkable.
traits.name: dragon

traits.description: There was a legend of a SWAT whose gun kata was tricky and deadly like a devil, therefore got the name Evil Gunner. Timmy can earn this title means that his battle skill was outstanding.
traits.name: evilgunner

traits.description: Once a revengeful designer with gifts, after shooting his first love right in her head, he is now a doctor devoted into charity in order to redeem himself. Timmy with this title is meaning that Timmy is gifted in medicne and craftsmanship.
traits.name: virtuousdoctor

traits.description: There was once a mad sniper called Eagle Eye who, by his extraordinary shooting skill, only aiming for others' genital organ. Timmy can get this title means his shooting skill is extraordinary.
traits.name: eagleeye

traits.description: Once there was a serial killer who was called the Scream, because of his extreme ugliness, he torture and killed many handsome people and crafted them into some kind of sickness art as a protest to the God. Timmy must be a psychopath and really good at craftsmanship to earn this title.
stats: Fire starting spree mental state disabled.
Giving up and leaving mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Wandering in psychosis mental state disabled.
Binging on food mental state disabled.
Fire starting spree mental state disabled.
Giving up and leaving mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Wandering in psychosis mental state disabled.
Binging on food mental state disabled.

traits.name: thescream

traits.description: There was once a pirate lord who invade every planet and every faction that he feels like to. No one dare to stand and against him, however, there were seven warrior who challenged him. After a whole night of battle, the pirate lord was defeated. his battle skill must be getting out of control to earn this title.
traits.name: piratelord

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description: An all-female race of humans spliced with fox genes. Originally, they were Glitterworld designermates from the planet Aolara, but an internal war forced them to leave their homeworld. Now they are spread among the rim.
races.name: Kurin

races.description: A baseline orassan, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Orassia planets. A mammalian humanoid feline race. Evolving in cold caves and life on space ships make it so they don't mind the dark or being inside for long periods of time.
races.name: orassan

races.description: A hybrid with DNA from a human and an orassan. Typically created through careful genetic engineering in a lab, or the "natural" way from individuals with closely regulated gene mods, these hybrids combine some of the best traits from their parent species. The particular traits and physical characteristics that are being inherited are typically chosen by the parents having the child, but they almost always have two feline ears and a feline tail, both with fur sharing the same color as the hair on their head.
races.name: neko

races.description: A weird being.
races.name: Anthro

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic avian, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: avianmorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic canine, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: caninemorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic cervine, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: cervinemorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic dragon, but is otherwise identical to the average human. They are exceedingly rare due to the extensive and expensive modifications made to their physiology.
races.name: dragomorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic feline, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: felinemorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic hyena, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: gnollmorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic lapine, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: lagomorph

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic fox, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: Vulpinemorph

races.description:
A race with rabbit-like ears and a tail.
They are generally fast. They are also dexterous, so they are good at cultivation and crafts.
Also, because of its adorable appearance, it is easy for humans to accept it favorably, and it seems that it is good at business and negotiations.
However, their body is fragile and they are not good at hard work. Be careful of serious injuries.
races.name: Leporidia

races.description:
A race with bear-like ears and a tail.
Although they are strong and good at hard work, they tend to hungry and needs a little longer rest.
It's a good idea to assign construction, mining, and Hauling.
Be careful not to offend them too much, however, as they are not very forgiving when it comes to fisticuffs.
races.name: Ursushang

races.description:
A race with fox-like ears and a tail.
They are rarer than other Arcamalian and often live in closed communities in the mountains.
They are good at brain labor and medical techniques, and have a constitution that is resistant to illness and easily exerts paranormal power.
Perhaps because of that background, they are a little more prideful and often look down on humans and other Arcamalian.
races.name: Vulpadie

races.description: A canine-like species of Kobolds. Kobolds in general are a hardy race that will eat nearly anything without complaint. They are also known to be dilligent workers, unafraid of the dark, and unbothered by some of the other fiddly trifels that other races might winge about. The downside is that they are small, making them unsuited to heavy lifting and easy to kill in combat. The Camerline, or "Dogbolds" as there are often known, are particularly agressive compared to other breeds as they were origionally created by humans as a sort of mix between foot soldier and attack hound. They were designed to be smart enough to take orders but not smart enough to question their masters. Unfourtunately for the origional human masters, the Camerline were just a bit too smart for their own good and ended up forming their own society and ousting the humans. In the many genrations since then, Camerline have developed into a war-like tribal society and have forgotten their origins, though many still harbor an instinctive dislike for humnans.
races.name: Camerline Kobold

races.description: A small, squat humanoid with large, droopy ears and glowing yellow eyes. They are mostly harmless and easily scared off by larger humanoids.
races.name: Cutebold

races.description: Fell Fox
races.name: Fell Fox

races.description: Fell Wolf
races.name: Fell Wolf

races.description: Fell Lynx
races.name: Fell Lynx

races.description: Fell Serval
races.name: Fell Serval

races.description: Fell Bear
races.name: Fell Bear

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Cheetah are perhaps one of the fastest Felines with an instant reaction. They literally dance around an opponent in melee fight and even dodge bullets if lucky enough. Cheetah are one of the most intelligent felines and are more social, compared to most felines.
races.name: Cheetah

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Jaguars are perhaps one of the strongest and toughest Felines. You shouldn't understimate them despite their size. They are not a very social beings and tend to spend their free time alone.
races.name: Jaguar

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Leo, unlike other Felines, are very social beings and feel themselves confident in all kinds of discussions.
races.name: Leo

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Panthers do not have any special features compared to other felines, expect their dark black fur. They are not a very social beings and tend to spend their free time alone.
races.name: Panther

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Tigris are perhaps one of the strongest and toughest Felines. You shouldn't understimate them despite their size. They are not a very social beings and tend to spend their free time alone.
races.name: Tigris

races.description: Ferian is Developed by advanced genetic engineering. They have fast speed and high intelligence, and their lives are a little longer. However, there is a downside that it is not suitable for physical labor. They don't care whether they eat raw food or sleep in a cold place or sleep on the floor.
races.name: Ferian

races.description: A xenohuman that is biosculpted to resemble an anthropomorphic bovine, but is otherwise identical to the average human. Most originate from ultra-tech glitterworld cultures and are consequently uncommon on the rim.
races.name: bovinemorph

races.description: the Marvelous gift of glitterworld bionics. Humanoid with cat ears and tail.
races.name: Nyaron
